Say, Tillius, say, wherein thy profit, when

Thou didst assume the laticlave again, And Tribune’s office? Grew not envy rife, which else had spared thee in a private lise? For just as when some sool his leg hath braced With sable buskins, and adown his waist Bade flow the lordly laticlave‚ he hears Question on question buzz about his ears;
